name: Deep Squid
description:
Deep Squid is a humorous adventure. You, the last known Kraken, must help save the local reef from mysterious goings on at the volcano. Bork the Sarcastic will guide you through this odd world as you grow stronger and encounter both endearing and dangerous sea life. Together, you will learn how to survive in this beautiful but dangerous underwater world.

Website: http://deepsquid.weebly.com/

Twitter: https://twitter.com/DeepSquidGame/

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DeepSquid/
